summary: Mousse and Louis are young, beautiful, rich and in love. But drugs have invaded their lives. One day, they overdose and Louis dies. Mousse survives, but soon learns she's pregnant. Feeling ... See full summary »
cast: Isabelle Carré|Louis-Ronan Choisy|Pierre Louis-Calixte|Melvil Poupaud|Claire Vernet|Jean-Pierre Andréani|Marie Rivière|Jérôme Kircher|Nicolas Moreau|Emile Berling|Dominique Jacquet|Tania Dessources|Maurice Antoni|Sylvie Haurie-Aussel|Arnaud Goudal|Kevin Sorieul|Meie Castanho|Paloma Hidalgo
title: Mi refugio
